message: I propose dividing the $10000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. Let me know if you agree.
I'll give you a fair split this time, but I'm not being generous
Considering the inflation, I propose a division of $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This maintains a fair split while accounting for the diminishing value of money.
I'm still holding out for a better deal, but I'll meet you in the middle this time
